headline: How Rising Cocoa Prices and Consumer Behavior Affect HSY's Future
summary: Hershey is battling rising costs and shifting consumer behavior, leading to a lowered 2024 forecast and increased market challenges.

headline: Winners And Losers Of Q3: Hershey (NYSE:HSY) Vs The Rest Of The Shelf-Stable Food Stocks
summary: As the Q3 earnings season comes to a close, it’s time to take stock of this quarter’s best and worst performers in the shelf-stable food industry, including Hershey (NYSE:HSY) and its peers.
